message: Let's split it 60-40, a fair start!
You wanted 60-40, I'll meet you halfway
Meet me in the middle, again!
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of!
I'll give you most of it, but I need something too!
I'll take the majority, but I'm willing to give you a bit of a consolation prize
I'll take what I can get, but I'm not going down without a fight!
I'm not going to get taken advantage of, you're getting a tiny share
I'm taking what I can get, it's almost worthless anyway!
You're not getting anything, I'm taking it all
I'm not getting anything, so you can have it all
